price: (Babai) tha: “Unë brengosem po ta merrni dhe kam frikë se mos do ta hajë ujku, ndërkohë që ju s’do ta keni mendjen tek ai.”
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّي لَيَحۡزُنُنِيٓ أَن تَذۡهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَخَافُ أَن يَأۡكُلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَأَنتُمۡ عَنۡهُ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qāla innī layaḥzununī an tadhhabū bihi wa-akhāfu an yakulahu al-dhi'bu wa-antum ʿanhu ghāfilūna
